scripts.pp_echo_size: cd build/all/app; find . -iname '*.click' | xargs du -sh | cut -d'	' -f1 | sed 's@^@Package filesize: @'
scripts.fin_echo_forget_review:
echo "#########################################
Run before uploading app to OpenStore:
  $ clickable review"

default: clean build pp_echo_size newline pp_echo_install_run install launch fin_echo_forget_review
